ideas.headline: Stop Guessing. Iterate Faster. Convert More.
ideas.body: Manual ad testing kills ROI. Instantly iterate winning ads, slash optimization time, and boost conversions across all campaigns.
ideas.raw_llm_response:
```json

    {
```
